root.name: Defenders of Ardania
root.description: OverviewDefenders of Ardania is a Tower Defense/ Offense developed by Most Wanted Games and as of E3 2011 it has a confirmed release for the PC. PSN and XBLA releases are also on the horizon.The game takes place in the fantasy world of the Majesty strategy games.FeaturesOffensive and Defensive operationsThree playable races, each featuring their own unique environments24 different upgradeable towers, available for building and to fight off the invading forces24 varied units with distinct attributes, available for those playing on the offenseStrong multiplayer component with a variety of game modes for up to four playersInteractive environment that affects gameplayA wide range of both offensive and defensive spells
